attributes.action: Give Dr Ian Roberts the George Medal
attributes.background: After the valiance he displayed getting Haas Formula One Driver Romain Grosjean out of the fiery remains, after the horrific crash in the 2020 Bahrain Grand Prix, I believe Dr Roberts deserves the George Medal

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for honours for specific individuals, including giving them a medal.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
